description: Climbers Antal Posza and Beni Laczko can't wait to scale the Cursed Gorge, but George Vidanov thinks it's too dangerous.  George agrees on one condition - that he'll have one last sexual encounter before he faces the hazards of the climb.  Antal and Beni eagerly submit to his demands.  The men strip down and devote themselves to a scorching session of cocksucking, rimming and ass-pounding - leaving them with a steamy memory of the encounter...should it be their last.
title: Full Expedition, Scene #01
